mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Walker, Charles W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov F H Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 15 1862. By Telegraph from Martinsburg 15 1862. What are to be the instructions to the commissioners of Election for Berkley county I wish to act with them in preventing Disloyal men from voting. Chas W Walker Maj Comdg Post 26M114paid
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Walker, Charles W.
Martinsburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
